definition: surname Yun/abbr. for Yunnan Province 雲南省|云南省[Yun2 nan2 Sheng3]

sentences.english: To the star chau fry flour and wonton soup.
sentences.chinese: 要了星洲炒粉和雲吞湯。

sentences.english: But it's pretty obvious the customers are here for the wanton noodles.
sentences.chinese: 很明顯地，大家都是衝着雲吞麪而來的。

sentences.english: The nice lady will then fill your bowls up with soup and won tons.
sentences.chinese: 這個女士會用雲吞和湯裝滿你的碗。

sentences.english: This page shows 8 different ways of folding wontons .
sentences.chinese: 這一頁展示了8種不同的包雲吞方法。

sentences.english: Egg noodles are served here, and cooked with black sauce.
sentences.chinese: 雲吞麪是全蛋面，用黑醬油調味的。

sentences.english: In Cantonese cuisine, shrimp filled wonton is most commonly served with thin noodles to make wonton noodles.
sentences.chinese: 在粵菜，蝦填補餛飩是最常見的送達細面，使雲吞麪。

definition: flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
shumai (shao mai) steamed dumpling/also written 燒麥|烧麦[shao1 mai4]
rice noodle roll, a roll made from sheets of rice flour dough, steamed and stuffed with meat, vegetables etc
